languages.text: {n}Мужчина еще долго прислушивается к гомону трущоб, почти беззвучно нашептывая молитву Богу-Императору.{/n}
{n}The old man carries on listening to the clamour of the slum for a long time, whispering an almost silent prayer to the God-Emperor all the while.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Мужчина еще долго прислушивается к гомону трущоб, почти беззвучно нашептывая молитву Богу-Императору.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The man continues to listen to the clamour of the slum for a long time, while whispering an almost silent prayer to the God-Emperor.{/n}
{n}The man continues to listen to the clamour of the slum for a long time, while whispering an almost silent prayer to the God-Emperor.{/n}

{n}The old man carries on listening to the clamour of the slum for a long time, whispering an almost silent prayer to the God-Emperor all the while.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El anciano sigue escuchando el clamor del suburbio durante un largo rato, sin dejar de susurrar una oración casi silenciosa al Dios Emperador.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old man carries on listening to the clamour of the slum for a long time, whispering an almost silent prayer to the God-Emperor all the while.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El anciano sigue escuchando el clamor del suburbio durante un largo rato, sin dejar de susurrar una oración casi silenciosa al Dios Emperador.{/n}

languages.text: {n}老人は長い間、スラム街の喧騒に耳を傾けたまま、ほとんど無言で神帝陛下への祈りを囁き続ける。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old man carries on listening to the clamour of the slum for a long time, whispering an almost silent prayer to the God-Emperor all the while.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}老人は長い間、スラム街の喧騒に耳を傾けたまま、ほとんど無言で神帝陛下への祈りを囁き続ける。{/n}

languages.text: {n}老人静静地呆在原地，聆听着贫民窟里的喧闹，同时低声向神皇祈祷。他的祈祷声几乎弱不可闻。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old man carries on listening to the clamour of the slum for a long time, whispering an almost silent prayer to the God-Emperor all the while.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}老人静静地呆在原地，聆听着贫民窟里的喧闹，同时低声向神皇祈祷。他的祈祷声几乎弱不可闻。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der alte Mann lauscht lange dem Lärm des Slums und betet dabei die ganze Zeit fast lautlos zum Gottimperator.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old man carries on listening to the clamour of the slum for a long time, whispering an almost silent prayer to the God-Emperor all the while.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der alte Mann lauscht lange dem Lärm des Slums und betet dabei die ganze Zeit fast lautlos zum Gottimperator.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le vieil homme continue d'écouter la clameur des bas quartiers tout en murmurant une prière presque silencieuse à l'Empereur-Dieu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old man carries on listening to the clamour of the slum for a long time, whispering an almost silent prayer to the God-Emperor all the while.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vieil homme continue d'écouter la clameur des bas quartiers tout en murmurant une prière presque silencieuse à l'Empereur-Dieu.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İhtiyar adam, kenar mahallenin feryadını dinlemeye uzunca bir süre devam ediyor. Tüm bu süre boyunca neredeyse duyulmayan bir fısıltıyla Tanrı İmparator'a dua ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old man carries on listening to the clamour of the slum for a long time, whispering an almost silent prayer to the God-Emperor all the while.{/n}
